mapper.select: SELECT VLO.MNGR_ID , VLO.MNGR_EXPSR_NM , VLO.MNGR_EMAIL , VLO.MNGR_PASSWORD , VLO.LOGIN_FAILR_CO , VLO.MNGR_ACNT_STTUS , VLO.LAST_PASSWORD_CHANGE_DT , VLO.USE_AT , VLO.DELETE_AT , (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MAX(LOGIN_DT),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') FROM CO_MNGR_LOGIN_HIST LH WHERE LOGIN_ID = VLO.MNGR_ID AND RESULT_CODE='C025001') AS LAST_LOGIN_DT , (SELECT CONECT_IP FROM CO_MNGR_LOGIN_HIST LH WHERE LOGIN_ID = VLO.MNGR_ID AND RESULT_CODE='C025001' ORDER BY LH.LOGIN_SEQ DESC LIMIT 0,1) AS LAST_LOGIN_IP FROM VI_LOGIN VLO WHERE VLO.MNGR_ID = #{mngrId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CO_MNGR_LOCK( MNGR_ID, ORDR, MNGR_ACNT_STTUS, RESN, DELETE_AT, FRST_REGIST_DT, FRST_REGISTER_ID ) VALUES( #{loginId}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(A.ORDR),0) + 1 FROM CO_MNGR_LOCK A WHERE A.MNGR_ID = #{loginId}), #{mngrAcntSttus}, #{resn}, 'N', #{loginDt}, #{loginId} )
